pli-tv-bu-vb-sk40:1.11: _Khajjaka_. According to [](Sp.2.615) this refers to all non-staple foods: _Ettha mūlakhādanīyādi sabbaṃ gahetabbaṃ_, “Here the non-staple foods which are roots, etc. may all be taken.” | _Phalāphale_. See PED s.v. _ā_<sup>4</sup>. | _Uttaribhaṅga_. According to [](Vin-vn-ṭ.1907) this is just another word for _byañjana_: _uttaribhaṅgaṃ nāma byañjanaṃ_. _Byañjana_ seems to refer to curries apart from the standard bean-curries, which are called _sūpa_.
